import{combineReducers}from"redux";import{persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";//defaults to localStorage for web
import userReducer from"./user/user-reducer";import cartReducer from"./cart/cart-reducer";import directoryReducer from"./directory/directory-reducer";import shopReducer from"./shop/shop-reducer";var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer,directory:directoryReducer,shop:shopReducer});//Persist Config
var persistConfig={key:"root",storage:storage,whiteList:["cart"]};//Persisted Reducer
export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
